title: Seed growth containers clip content with no scroll indicator
description: Seed growth elements have fixed max-height caps (.seed-growth: 220px, .cyoa-expansion: 300px, .inline-seed-growth: 180px) that clip longer content with no overflow scroll or visual indicator that content is truncated. Add 'overflow-y: auto' to these containers, or remove the max-height cap entirely and rely on the CSS transition for the expand/collapse animation.

title: Fix marginalia positioned off-screen on smaller viewports
description: The .dwell-annotation uses 'right: -180px' (line 627) which pushes annotations outside the visible area on viewports under ~1100px wide. The mobile fallback (line 813-821) stacks it inline but loses the margin-note effect entirely. Consider a responsive approach that keeps marginalia visible (e.g., collapsible sidebar, tooltip, or inline callout) across viewport sizes.

title: Review graph edge density — consider pruning 3-4 edges
description: 18 edges for 8 nodes gives average degree ~4.5. averaging-problem and understanding-illusion connect to 6 of 7 other nodes. The rhizome metaphor works better with selective, surprising connections rather than near-complete connectivity. Consider removing the weakest thematic links to make remaining connections more meaningful.
